title: Incident
alt: He sees you when you're sleeping, he knows when you're awake, he's copied on /var/spool/mail/root, so be good for goodness' sake.
transcript:
[Rob is sitting at a computer. The computer's prompt is shown.]
[email protected]~$ sudo su
Password:
robm is not in the sudoers file. This incident will be reported.
[email protected]~$ █[Megan approaches.]
Rob: Hey — who does sudo report these "incidents" to?
Megan: You know, I've never checked.[Santa Claus is sitting at a desk supported by candy canes, with a red monitor. On the wall are two lists labeled 'naughty' and 'nice'. He is in the process of adding a line to the 'naughty' list.]
